title: Parking spaces for differently-abled persons shall be provided as stipulated in these regulations in each new construction / development / re-development in the NMRC
clause_text: Parking spaces for differently-abled persons shall be provided as stipulated in these regulations in each new construction / development / re-development in the NMRC.
